valueProp: Since 2000, Abrams Fensterman, LLP has provided exceptional legal service to major corporations, small businesses, health care providers, real estate developers, families, and more. With strong Brooklyn roots, our full-service law firm has since branched out to serve New Yorkers from five offices throughout the state.
